CustomField.description: ** Use for Reporting on Responses ** The report response field trims the length of the entered response to restrict size to less than 255 chars. Currently salesforce will not allow a report to perform groupings on long text area fields.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: ** Use for Reporting on Responses ** The report response field trims the length of the entered response to restrict size to less than 255 chars. Currently salesforce will not allow a report to perform groupings on long text area fields.
CustomField.label: Report Response
